resources.string:
Sudoku for Android(s) is played after the normal Sudoku rules which are the following:
 1) Each row must have the numbers 1-9 occuring just once.
 2) Each column must have the numbers 1-9 occuring just once.
 3) The numbers 1-9 must occur just once in each of the 9 sub-boxes of the grid.

Sudoku for Android(s) was developed by students of the University of applied science in DÃ¼sseldorf(Germany) as their first computer science project. 

Participants:
 Jan Monschke
 Abdelhak El-Boubsi
 Carsten Ruhr
 Dominik Lazarek

 Professor:
 Prof. Dr.-Ing. MSc. Markus Dahm
